attributes.action: Petition to get Wrestlemania 29 to Southport
attributes.additional_details:
Help bring the greatest event on Earth to the sunny seaside resort of Southport.
Southport is often described as the jewel of the north by at least 4 people and it's easy to understand why; with over 6 coffee shops and a Waterstone's. Southport stands out head and shoulders above the rest of the world's towns and cities and deserves to host Wrestlemania
